name: Romance with the Dunes
description:
Embrace yourself with the rugged and inviting Sand Dunes of glorious Jodhpur. With this tour, the thrilling and unique experiences are limitless. Race on the mounting and plummeting sand waves of the expansive desert, tread on dry riverbeds and take in the enthralling sights of wild life. Head to the ancient town that is nestled in world famous Thar Desert.

With this package, tour to one of the cleanest village in India, get welcomed by villager folks and revel in their colourful ceremonies. End your day with the warm wrap of the campfire and reel in the artistic performances by the folk dancer and singers.
